sentences.sContent: These skills were passed on to subsequent generations.
...despite an increase in the UK population and a subsequent rise in the number of households...
...More on this study and the star ratings will appear in a subsequent post...
...including students’ overall academic accomplishments and their subsequent performance in college...

phrases.pCn: 财务报表编制后发生的事项

remMethod.val: sub(接近) ＋ sequ(跟随) ＋ ent(…的) → 随后的

trans.tranOther: happening or coming after something else
